pages.text: The $(l)Nexus$() mod is very adjustable, you can turn various features of the mod on and off in the server's config file. $(br2)This file is created after you have started the server with the installed mod once. $(br2)You can find it in your server directory under the path: $(n)$(8)world\serverconfig\nexus-server.toml$()

$(br)You can open the file with many editors, but I recommend $(l:https://notepad-plus-plus.org/)Notepad++$() $(br2)The file contains all options with description. $(br2)Remember that every time you change the file, you have to restart the server or reload the configs with a command.
